page.title: 19POPULATION..HOUSEHOLDERS
page.content: Because far fewer people work on farms in our area many farm cottages are now occupied by people who are either retired or who travel to work in nearby towns.At Mount Farm three out of four farm cottages are owned privately.Mr.Eglen retired to one of these cottages with his wife.He worked in Somerset for many years but his wife was native to this area and they decided to retire here.Mr.Eglen is impressed with our local scenery which he thinks strongly resembles the area of the Dorset Downs he knew many years ago.Being central to other parts of Scotland is another advantage.Mr.Eglen especially likes the local climate with its invigorating air,ideal for his chest complaint.They are pleased to be living in this part of the countryside and are looking forward to a long and happy retirement.
